# samsungcloudplatformv2_ske_nodepool (Data Source)

nodepool

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "samsungcloudplatformv2" {
}

data "samsungcloudplatformv2_ske_nodepool" "nodepool" {
    id = var.id
}


output "nodepool" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatformv2_ske_nodepool.nodepool
}


variable "id" {
  type    = string
  default = ""
}
```
